mapper.select: SELECT PARKING_ID AS parkingId, PARKING_NAME AS parkingName, PARKING_LON AS parkingLon, PARKING_LAT AS parkingLat, PARKING_FEE AS parkingFee, PARKING_CODE AS parkingCode, PARKING_ADDRESS AS parkingAddress, PARKING_ADDRESS_D AS parkingAddressD FROM PARKING_TABLE

SELECT parking_id FROM ( SELECT parking_id, ( 6371000 * acos( cos(radians(#{lat})) * cos(radians(parking_lat)) * cos(radians(parking_lon) - radians(#{lng})) + sin(radians(#{lat})) * sin(radians(parking_lat)) ) ) AS distance FROM TB_PARKING WHERE parking_lat BETWEEN #{lat} - 0.001 AND #{lat} + 0.001 AND parking_lon BETWEEN #{lng} - 0.001 AND #{lng} + 0.001 ) WHERE distance <= 100 ORDER BY distance FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
